texts.title: Hot Date Dash
texts.short-description: Make it to your date unscathed, and a little tipsy!
texts.full-description: You're a nerd. You're allergic to bees. You managed to land a date! You need to traverse through the city to pick her up. Be sure to "loosen" up before you get there.
texts.keywords: platformer, oldschool, arcade, adventure, date, dash, hot, nerd, bees, city, fun, bored, hard, difficult, cute, cheery, cheerful, colorful
